subject: Validation Result: p3-2-c Server Settings Modal (Discord-Style)

findings.notes: The feature implementation is solid and production-ready. The main issues are in the test suite configuration, not the actual functionality. Code quality is high with proper Discord styling, Matrix integration, and error handling.

content.summary: Implementation complete and high-quality, but test infrastructure needs fixes before final approval.
content.recommendation: CONDITIONAL PASS - Core functionality complete but resolve test issues before marking fully complete
